data.text: @elie_mcn @absurdistlocker I check the AHS covi website often.  Presently, 81% of covi cases were vaxed, 70% of hospitalizations were vaxed, and 64% of covi deaths were vaxed. These are the numbers that matter.
@elie_mcn Asinine really.  For supposedly intelligent people they surely are dumb
@elie_mcn no masking, no mandates and no medical censorship.
@elie_mcn @DavidAnber They certainly do and for as long as they can
@elie_mcn @ezralevant Seems their real goal is a Subscription Based education.

@elie_mcn @ezralevant That's academia for you. It's not ever about what makes sense or efficiency because it is funded. Usually by the Government. So to all you in academia start looking for a new career as the wells have run dry. The gravy train is over. Lol

@elie_mcn I am under contract for a local university. 95% in all high schools I have visited still masking and same checklist when I arrive. It is perpetuated by the Harvard class, Peloton Zoomers. The indoctrination has worked thus far. So much for “the future.”
@elie_mcn @ezralevant We have journalists in Canada? Huh….
@elie_mcn My Vet wants me to answer these same questions. To examine my dog. I'm not allowed to enter the office. I do not answer.
@elie_mcn @ezralevant The higher the claim of enlightenment the more absurd the institution has become.
